data.title: Two Times Not a Charm
data.text: This is my second trip to Bellissimo with a 20+ group Private Party where the eatery was essentially dedicated to the party.  The service remained excellent and attentive, but this time the quality of the meal was noticeably lower.  I paid for the first party and assured we had the best of the best, but did not pay for this party so I can't say whether that was the driver.  I will go back to see what it is like as a normal patron given my first very positive experience.

data.title: Wood burning pizza oven
data.text:
If you like pizza and other Italian specialties. Everything that I have had there has been very good. Stop by for some good food.
Gene P
Coplay, PA

data.title: Amazing!!!!!
data.text: The best Italian restaurant in the Lehigh valley!!! The service was wonderful and the food was absolutely delicious. My family and I loved it here and we will definitely be coming back!

data.title: Great food ... Friendly staff
data.text: The gnocchi with Gorgonzola were out of this world good. It killed my diet but I have no regrets. The Salmon was prepared and served well. My guest throughly enjoyed her salad and Osso buco special.We will be certain to return soon

data.title: Great food and service
data.text: With an extensive menu the choices are there for any great Italian meal.  We were there twice last month and all meals were excellent.  The prices are reasonable and the quantity is such that we never leave without a take away - for us and not our dog. On one of those visits, our daughter who loves veal and had only been there once before, thoroughly enjoyed the veal parmesan. Service was very good and the waiter was attentive to our needs.

data.title: Fantastic Italian food, wonderful service, great prices
data.text: 3 of us ate dinner here and would absolutely return.  The mini garlic bread bites to start were so delicious we could've finished off the entire plate and not been able to eat our entrees.  The appetizer shrimp was wrapped in prosciutto and was outstanding.  The veal scalloppini was plentiful and tender.  I ordered a side of mixed vegetables instead of pasta and was pleasantly surprised with an plateful of roasted carrots, green beans, bell peppers and broccoli.  The total for 1 appetizer, 3 glasses of wine and 3 entrees was just over $100.  The service was excellent.

data.title: Amazon!
data.text: The food was amazing went with some friends and had a blast! Serves was great very friendly. Highly recommend it plan to go again!

data.title: Excellent food, service not
data.text: This Italian restaurant was once my favorite and frequented when in the area numerous times.  The food was excellent.  The service of a grumpy old man was rude, obnoxious, and deplorable!  I no longer frequent this restaurant

data.title: You do not have to Sicilian
data.text:
Had Saltimbocco with veal, also Sicillan style pasta with veal both were excellent. Our friends had grilled chicken parmigiana.
The service was friendly and efficient.
We had 5:30 Saturday reservations by 6:00 the restaurant was full.
The noise level was a bit high, but food was worth it.
Would go back agin.

data.title: Great place
data.text: A real gem in Allentown. Good sized portions, tasty choices. We highly recommend this place, nestled in a residential area.

data.title: GREAT PLACE TO HANG
data.text:
Was there with a very large group of people getting together for a upcoming ski trip .....very friendly hostess and very prompt service considering the mayhem ;-)

Had more than a few slices of pizza with toppings - apps were great as well.

It was very nice to have a small parking lot out back and plenty on the side street parking that was perpendicular to Tilghman street .....

Go there - you won't be disappointed as others have stated ;-)

data.title: Best Italian in Allentown
data.text: This is the best Italian restaurant we have found in Allentown. The pizza is excellent, nice thin crust, excellent sauce. On our last visit I had the Lobster Key West. Lobster, Scallops, Shrimp over angel hair with a blush sauce. It was so good. Pasta cooked nice and al dente, seafood not over cooked. Just lovely. My husband had the Braised Pork Shank which was so tender and delicious! Service is friendly and just the right amount of attention.

data.title: Very Good!
data.text: Mom found this place cruising around on Google. Decided we would stop here today for lunch & I'm so glad we did. The staff was very friendly, the food was very good. We both had the chicken parmigian. It was awesome!  The hot bread was full of garlic & was good too!!

data.title: Very Nice Italian Restaurant
data.text: As a couple, we really enjoyed our Saturday dinner at Bellissimo's. They have a small parking lot behind the restaurant and there was lots of street parking available in the neighborhood. The inside of the restaurant is nicely furnished, but it can be quite noisy, so we elected to sit outside under the umbrella tables; this was quite enjoyable, although there was some distracting noise from occasional road traffic. I had the veal parmigiana with linguini pasta; both were delicious with tender, thin slices of breaded veal. The salad, complimentary garlic rolls, and moderately priced house wines were nice additions to the meals. My wife had the shrimp in red sauce over angel hair pasta which she enjoyed. Both meals were quite filling and we could not finish all the food. We also enjoyed a small, shared appetizer of Bruschetta.

data.title: Nice Surprise!
data.text: I purchased a Groupon Offer for Bellissimo to use whenever I was in the area.  I was pleasantly surprised by the quaint ambiance and courteous, accommodating staff because of the location.  I felt like I was in an Italian countryside instead of near the middle of Allentown.  The menu provided an nice array of delicious choices.  The food was very good and portions more than adequate.  I highly recommend Bellissimo for a mid-week getaway or weekend date night.  Mangia!

data.title: My new favorite!!
data.text: Amazing food!!!! Can't wait to go back and try more things!! Service was excellent!! Remember to save room for dessert!!! Everything excellent!!

data.title: Food good, service uneven, very noisy
data.text: We were a party of 10. We were told that separate checks, or even 2 checks would not be possible. The orders got messed up, food was delivered unevenly. When the check came, we divided it and then were told that some of the wines had been left off. The waitress grabbed the check and presented another one. This precipitated an argument. Everyone was annoyed. The foof was good, but was spoiled by the uneven service.

data.title: Allentown'so best Italian  restaurant
data.text: We love going to bellissimo's. We love their food. Whenever we have guests from out of town we take them here. Never disappointed. Garlic rolls are #1. Plenty of food for lunch the next day. Every pasta dish we've tried was good. Hubby especially enjoyed the eggplant rolatini.

data.title: Excellent food, HORRIBLE service.
data.text:
I live very near by this restaurant.  They server excellent Italian fare better than most.  But the last TWO times I visited this restaurant, the service was horrible.  We went two weeks ago, when there was a large party of 15 or so.  We waited nearly an hour for our food, which finally arrived grossly undercooked.  We spoke with the manager who was apologetic, but nonetheless had no excuse.  
Then we went last night, and had to wait over an hour for our food.  I used to love going here, the food was always excellent and the service friendly and timely.  But I'm going to seriously rethink going here again, as twice in a row to very bad experiences.

data.title: One of THE best restaurants in Allentown, PA
data.text: Though we live in northern New England, my wife and I have dined more than a dozen times at Bellissimo, sometimes just for the two of us, or with a group. When we visit Allentown, we always dine there.  The garlic rolls are to kill for!  The food is excellent. The wine list is very reasonable but not fancy.   The staff is first rate and they always greet us like we are regulars.  We have noted that local families and groups of friends choose Bellissimo for special occasions. Never have we had a mediocre or bad dining experience there.
